 2022-05322022-05-19,  ,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActPilotage Act
Budget Implementation Act, 2019, No. 1
SubjectRegulations Amending the General Pilotage Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the GENERAL PILOTAGE REGULATIONS in order to (1) combine four existing pilotage authority regulations; (2) update outdated language and references, and align the regulations with the provisions of the Act; (3) clarify the Ministerâ€™s authority to issue pilot licences and pilotage certificates; and (4) ensure that a marine pilotage reciprocity arrangement between Canada and the United States remains in place to avoid supply chain impacts.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0114 Publication Date: 2022-06-08
